title: Purse, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: beaded crochet
description: Small sac of dark red crocheted silk with gilt beads, with a ring of plain gold to open or close. Top finished with two gold bars with gold knobs, single gold drop at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: beaded crochet. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-16.
